      • create

        @RequestMapping(method=POST)
public Video create(@RequestBody
                                                  Video video)
        This method calls the VideoService method to create new Video object
        Parameters:
        video - Object of Video
        Returns:
        Newly created object of Video

      • delete

        @RequestMapping(method=DELETE,
                value="{title}")
public void delete(@PathVariable(value="title")
                                                                                     java.lang.String title)
        This method calls the VideoService method to delete the specific video
        Parameters:
        title - title of a video

      • findAll

        @RequestMapping(method=GET)
public java.util.List<Video> findAll()
        This method calls the VideoService method to retrieve all the videos
        Returns:
        List of videos

      • findByFilter

        @RequestMapping(method=GET,
                value="type={type}/year={year}/genre={genre}/sort={sort}")
public java.util.List<Video> findByFilter(@PathVariable(value="type")
                                                                                                                                                   java.lang.String type,
                                                                                                                                                   @PathVariable(value="year")
                                                                                                                                                   int year,
                                                                                                                                                   @PathVariable(value="genre")
                                                                                                                                                   java.lang.String genre,
                                                                                                                                                   @PathVariable(value="sort")
                                                                                                                                                   java.lang.String sort)
        This method calls the VideoService method to filter the videos according to input
        Parameters:
        type - type of a video
        year - released year of a video
        genre - genre of a video
        sort - sort by criteria
        Returns:
        List of videos

        @RequestMapping(method=GET,
                value="{title}")
public Video findByTitle(@PathVariable(value="title")

        Returns:
        Object of video

      • findByTitleSubstring

        @RequestMapping(method=GET,
                value="search={title}")
public java.util.List<Video> findByTitleSubstring(@PathVariable(value="title")
                                                                                                                        java.lang.String title)
        This method calls the VideoService method to find the video with matching substring of a title
        Parameters:
        title - Any substring of a title
        Returns:
        List of videos with a title match

      • update

        @RequestMapping(method=PUT,
                value="{title}")
public Video update(@PathVariable(value="title")
                                                                                   java.lang.String title,
                                                                                   @RequestBody
                                                                                   Video video)
        This method calls the VideoService method to update the video object of the specific video title
        Parameters:
        title - Title of the video
        video - Modified video object
        Returns:
        Updated Video object
